name: Tanks Boom Boom
description:
Welcome in this unique puzzle-casual game of Tanks Boom Boom.

Set aside! The Mega-Tank is coming, destroying everything in front of him. Our advice is to join the tank cabin,using all it’s skills like : speed booster,time warp,money booster,otherwise you risk being eaten alive. Convince yourself right now that either you win or you are bound to lose.

Your mission is to pass every level shooting the cubes so that mathematically it comes out at 0. Fire in the hole !

Game Features :
- More than 60 levels
- A series of bonus levels
- Use the special skills of the tank : speed booster, reload speed, money booster
